Rect Class Reference
UI Elements

Rect Class. More...

#include <Rect.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for Rect:

Detailed Description

The Rect class draws a rectangle on the display. It can be used for both horizontal and vertical separators as well.

Definition at line 18 of file Rect.hpp.
